dictionary.title: activity
dictionary.desc: A dictionary of 438 essential oil or constituent compound biochemical and/or biological activities

entry.description: Agents that are put on the skin to reduce sweating or prevent excess sweating (hyperhidrosis)
entry.name: Antiperspirants

entry.description: A substance causing the halt in the production of sebum (sebostasis) by the sebaceous glands.
entry.name: Sebostatic

entry.description: substance that acts locally on cutaneous or mucosal surfaces to produce inflammation
entry.name: irritant
entry.description: Gefahrstoffe
substance qui provoque des irritations
group of chemical compounds
entry.name: antineoplastic
entry.description: medicamento destinado a bloquear la proliferación de celulas cancerígenas
médicament destiné à bloquer la prolifération des cellules cancéreuses
medicine or chemical compound that inhibits or blocks prostaglandin
entry.name: antiprostaglandin

entry.description: preparation to induce evacuation of the bowels. produces a soft formed stool, and relaxes and loosens the bowels, typically used over a protracted period, to relieve constipation.
entry.name: purgative

entry.description: drug used to cause dilation of the blood vessels
entry.name: vasodilator agent
entry.description: Fármacos usados para relajar los músculos de las arterias. Usados en angina de pecho.
An agent that promotes healing through the formation of scar tissue. For example, sandalwood is a natural cicatrizant.
entry.name: Cicatrizant

entry.description: medication or chemical compound that treats neuralgia
entry.name: antineuralgic

entry.description: Functions to control the survival, growth, differentiation and effector function of tissues and cells.
entry.name: cytokine activity

entry.description: the property of chemical agents that damages the genetic information within a cell causing mutations, which may lead to cancer
entry.name: genotoxicity

entry.description: A substance that counteracts hair loss.
entry.name: anti alopecic

entry.description: The stopping, prevention or reduction of the activity of the enzyme ornithine decarboxylase. Ornithine decarboxylase antizyme (ODC-AZ) is an ornithine decarboxylase inhibitor.
entry.name: ornithine decarboxylase inhibitor activity

entry.description: class of drugs used to treat or ameliorate peptic ulcer or irritation of the gastrointestinal tract
entry.name: anti-ulcer drug

entry.description: substance that prevents infectious agents or organisms from spreading or kill infectious agents in order to prevent the spread of infection
entry.name: anti-infective agent

entry.description: Non-steroidal chemical compounds with abortifacient activity.
entry.name: Abortifacient Agents, Nonsteroidal

entry.description: An agent that kills Trichomonas organisms, such as in treating vaginitis that is caused by Trichomonas vaginalis.
entry.name: antitrichomonal agents

entry.description: Drugs that stimulate contraction of the myometrium. They are used to induce labor, obstetric at term, to prevent or control postpartum or postabortion hemorrhage, and to assess fetal status in high risk pregnancies.
entry.name: oxytocics
entry.description: substance qui favorise les contractions utérines

Agents that are used to treat allergic reactions. Most of these drugs act by preventing the release of inflammatory mediators or inhibiting the actions of released mediators on their target cells. (from ama drug evaluations annual, 1994, p475)
entry.name: Anti-Allergic Agents

entry.description: Drugs that are used to treat asthma
entry.name: Anti-Asthmatic Agents

entry.description: Allergent causing anaphylaxis, an allergic reaction with symptoms such as itchy rash, throat swelling, low blood pressure.
entry.name: anaphylactic

entry.description: an insecticide that is specifically targeted against the larval life stage of an insect. Their most common use is against mosquitoes. Larvicides may be contact poisons, stomach poisons, growth regulators, or (increasingly) biological control agents.
entry.name: larvicide

entry.description: drug which reduces appetite
entry.name: anorectic
entry.description: Arzneistoffe mit einer Appetit hemmenden Wirkung
composés chimiques diminuant l'appétit
substance intended to kill helminths (parasitic worms)
entry.name: anthelmintic
entry.description: medicamento utilizado en el tratamiento de las helmintiasis
Arzneistoff zur Bekämpfung von Würmern
Substances which lower blood glucose levels
entry.name: anti-diabetic medication
entry.description: Arzneimittel
médicament utilisé pour traiter le diabète sucré.
drug used to prevent nausea or vomiting
entry.name: antiemetic
entry.description: fármaco que impide el vómito (emesis) o la náusea
Medikamentengruppe
agent that prevents fibrinolysis or lysis of a blood clot or thrombus
entry.name: antifibrinolytic

entry.description: all drugs for hypertension's treatment
entry.name: antihypertensive drug
entry.description: grupo de fármacos utilizados para el tratamiento de la hipertensión
blutdrucksenkendes Arzneimittel
Antihypertenseur
class of medications
entry.name: anticonvulsant agent
entry.description: tipo de medicamento
Klasse von Arzneimitteln
pharmaceutical or chemical fungicide or fungistatic used to treat and prevent mycosis
entry.name: antifungal
entry.description: Medikamentenklasse
substance used to treat or prevent parasitic infections
entry.name: antiparasitic
entry.description: medicamento usado para el tratamiento de infecciones causadas por bacterias y parásitos
substance that reduces or suppresses inflammation
entry.name: anti-inflammatory agent
entry.description: symptomatischer Therapieansatz
médicament
class of pharmaceuticals used in treatment of protozoan infection
entry.name: antiprotozoal
entry.description: clase de fármacos para el tratamiento de parásitos protozoarios
drug that prevents or reduces fever by lowering the body temperature from a raised state
entry.name: antipyretic

fármaco que hace disminuir la fiebre
Fiebersenkender Arzneistoff
Agents that suppress cough. They act centrally on the medullary cough center. Expectorants, also used in the treatment of cough, act locally
entry.name: antitussive
entry.description: Arzneimittel gegen Husten
photosensitivity disorder in which an agent or allergen is activated by light to sensitize the allergic response
entry.name: photodermatitis
entry.description: Krankheit
activation d'un allergène par la lumière
Photoprotection is the biochemical process that helps organisms cope with molecular damage caused by sunlight
entry.name: Photoprotection

entry.description: class of pharmaceuticals that decrease platelet aggregation and inhibit thrombus formation
entry.name: platelet aggregation inhibitors

entry.description: category of pharmaceutical drugs
entry.name: Mast cell stabilizer
entry.description: Klasse von Arzneistoffen
topical skin product that helps protect against sunburn

entry.description: Emulsion zum Schutz vor Sonnenbrand

classe de médicaments

entry.name: sedative
entry.description: substance ayant une action dépressive sur le système nerveux central
Hemotoxins, haemotoxins or hematotoxins are toxins that destroy red blood cells, disrupt blood clotting, and/or cause organ degeneration and generalized tissue damage
entry.name: Hemotoxin

entry.description: class of psychoactive drugs
entry.name: Deliriant
entry.description: delirante

pesticide against molluscs, which are usually used in agriculture or gardening, in order to control gastropod pests specifically slugs and snails which damage crops or other valued plants by feeding on them
entry.name: molluscicide

entry.description: A substance that augments, stimulates, activates, potentiates, or modulates the immune response at either the cellular or humoral level.
entry.name: immunostimulant

entry.description: substance that increase the volume of secretion of bile from the liver
entry.name: Choleretic
entry.description: organische Verbindungen, Arzneistoffe
A food preservative that acts by chelating with metal cations (particularly those of copper, iron and nickel) that catalyse the oxidation of fats in food.
entry.name: sequestrant

entry.description: pesticide used to kill plant-parasitic nematodes
entry.name: nematicide
entry.description: produit phytosanitaire
hygroscopic substance used to keep things moist. A humectant that is used as a food additive to prevent foodstuffs from drying out.
entry.name: humectant
entry.description: sustancia química que humedece y suaviza
substance used to impart colour to another substance or object
entry.name: colourant
entry.description: sustancia química capaz de teñir fibras vegetales y animales
Sammelbezeichnung für alle farbgebenden Stoffe
terme générique pour toutes les matières décolorer les autres matières
substance that dilates the bronchi and bronchioles, decreasing resistance in the respiratory airway and increasing airflow to the lungs
entry.name: bronchodilator
entry.description: sustancia que causa que los bronquios y bronquiolos se dilaten, provocando una disminución en la resistencia aérea y permitiendo así el flujo de aire
pharmaceuticals used in the treatment of high levels of fats in the blood
entry.name: hypolipidemic
entry.description: sustancia farmacológicamente activa que tenga la propiedad de disminuir los niveles de lípidos en sangre
médicament dont l'action thérapeutique vise à diminuer les lipides circulant dans le sang
use of chemical compounds to prevent the development of a specific disease
entry.name: chemoprophylaxis

entry.description: drug or chemical that affects skeletal muscle function, decreases muscle tone
entry.name: muscle relaxant
entry.description: Substanz, die eine reversible Entspannung der Skelettmuskulatur bewirkt
substance which repels insects
entry.name: insect repellent

entry.description: A compound or agent that combines with the Hyaluronidase enzyme in such a manner as to prevent the normal substrate-enzyme combination and the catalytic reaction. Hyaluronidases are a family of enzymes that catalyse the degradation of hyaluronic acid
entry.name: hyaluronidase inhibitor

entry.description: medication or other intervention that inhibits anxiety
entry.name: anxiolytic
entry.description: 药物或其他干扰用于抑制焦虑症状

Angstlöser, heterogene Gruppe von Arzneistoffen
Famille de médicaments, luttant contre l'anxiété
class of psychoactive drugs whose primary function is to induce sleep and to be used in the treatment of insomnia (sleeplessness), or for surgical anesthesia.
entry.name: hypnotic

mixture used to produce a pleasant smell
entry.name: perfume
entry.description: 带有香味的液体

alkoholische Mixtur, die verdampfend einen angenehmen Geruch erzeugt
composition odorante
substance used to destroy pests
entry.name: pesticide
entry.description: sustancia diseñada para eliminar una peste

substance chimique utilisée pour tuer les organismes "nuisibles"
financial instrument whose value is based on one or more underlying assets

instrument financier qui est soutenue par des valeurs économiques réelles

propriété d'un antibiotique
The quality of being toxic to cells

entry.description: agent that suppresses immune function by one of several mechanisms of action (e.g. inhibiting DNA synthesis, inhibiting activation of T-cells, or inhibiting the activation of helper cells)

Substanzen, welche die Funktionen des Immunsystems vermindern
substance used in herbal medicine to promote homeostasis
entry.name: adaptogen
entry.description: Sammelbegriff für biologisch aktive Pflanzenstoffe
Any pharmacological or immunological agent that modifies or enhances the effect of other agents such as drugs or vaccines while having few if any direct effects when given by itself.
entry.name: adjuvant
entry.description: sustancia que se añade a una vacuna para potenciar o dirigir la respuesta inmunológica frente a un antígeno
Hilfsstoff, der die Wirkung eines Reagenz oder eines Arzneistoffes verstärkt

entry.description: chemical compound that tends to shrink or constrict body tissues

group of physiologically active lipid compounds

Agents that produce a soft formed stool, and relax and loosen the bowels, typically used over a protracted period, to relieve constipation
